name: file
longDescription: This manual page documents version 5.32 of the file command.

options.name: magic-file
options.description: Use LIST as a colon-separated list of magic number files.

options.name: uncompress
options.description: Try to look inside compressed files.

options.name: uncompress-noreport
options.description: Only print the contents of compressed files.

options.name: brief
options.description: Do not prepend filenames to output lines.

options.name: checking-printout
options.description: Print the parsed form of the magic file, use in conjunction with -m to debug a new magic file before installing it

options.name: exclude
options.description: exclude TEST from the list of test to be performed for file. Valid tests are: apptype, ascii, cdf, compress, elf, encoding, soft, tar, text, tokens.

options.name: files-from
options.description: Read the filenames to be examined from FILE.

options.name: separator
options.description: Use string as separator instead of `:'.

options.name: mime
options.description: Output MIME type strings (--mime-type and --mime-encoding).

options.name: apple
options.description: Output the Apple CREATOR/TYPE.

options.name: extension
options.description: Output a slash-separated list of extensions.

options.name: mime-type
options.description: Output the MIME type.

options.name: mime-encoding
options.description: Output the MIME encoding.

options.name: keep-going
options.description: Don't stop at the first match.

options.name: list
options.description: List magic strength.

options.name: dereference
options.description: Follow symlinks (default if POSIXLY_CORRECT is set).

options.name: no-dereference
options.description: Don't follow symlinks (default if POSIXLY_CORRECT is not set) (default).

options.name: no-buffer
options.description: Do not buffer output.

options.name: no-pad
options.description: Do not pad output.

options.name: print0
options.description: Terminate filenames with ASCII NUL.

options.name: preserve-date
options.description: set file engine parameter limits(indir        15 recursion limit for indirection, name         30 use limit for name/use magic, elf_notes   256 max ELF notes processed, elf_phnum   128 max ELF prog sections processed, elf_shnum 32768 max ELF sections processed).

options.name: raw
options.description: Don't translate unprintable chars to \ooo

options.name: special-files
options.description: Treat special (block/char devices) files as ordinary ones.

options.name: compile
options.description: Compile file specified by -m.

options.name: debug
options.description: Print debugging messages.
